DrugName: Pain management medication (e.g., acetaminophen, ibuprofen) if needed
Anticoagulant therapy to prevent further renal infarcts (e.g., aspirin, clopidogrel)
Blood pressure monitoring and management with lisinopril-hydrochlorothiazide
Cholesterol-lowering medication (e.g., atorvastatin) if simvastatin is not effective enough
